summary: Ethan Wilkins is a poor and honest man who ministers to the human soul, while his son Jason yearns to be a doctor, helping people in the earthly realm.
cast: Walter Huston|James Stewart|Beulah Bondi|Guy Kibbee|Charles Coburn|John Carradine|Ann Rutherford|Charley Grapewin|Leona Roberts|Gene Lockhart|Clem Bevans|Arthur Aylesworth|Gene Reynolds|Leatrice Joy Gilbert|Sterling Holloway|Charles Peck|Robert McWade|Minor Watson|Grace Bohanon|Ward Bond|Francis X. Bushman Jr.|Tex Cooper|Jules Cowles|Esther Dale|Stanley Fields|Joseph Forte|Brenda Fowler|Rosina Galli|Larry Harris|Evelyn Kurt|Larry Kurt|Frank McGlynn Jr.|Roger Moore|Jack Mulhall|Anne O'Neal|Guy Bates Post|William Stack|Phillip Terry|Charles Trowbridge
title: Ingratitud
